audio_description: If you're a beginner at cooking or want to make the perfect Hyderabadi Kacchi Gosht-style Chicken Dum Biryani, then this recipe is for you. We’ll make a very delicious and perfect Chicken Dum Biryani using simple home spices.

audio_description: We’ll make this recipe with 1.5 kg of rice and 1.5 kg of chicken. First, take 1.5 cups of oil and heat it. Into the hot oil, add 500 grams of thinly sliced onions. Fry the onions on medium to high flame until golden.

audio_description: Once the oil has cooled down, we’ll add 1.5 kg of chicken to it. I’ve used slightly bigger pieces of chicken, but you can use smaller pieces if you prefer. Now, for the whole spices, take 12 green cardamoms, 10 cloves, and 10 kabab chini (cubebs).

audio_description: Add 5 to 6 whole green chilies. Add 1 teaspoon of cumin powder, 1 teaspoon of coriander powder, 1 teaspoon of spicy red chili powder, half a teaspoon of turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon of garam masala powder, and salt according to the 1.5 kg quantity.

audio_description: Add the rice and gently stir it once with a spoon. As soon as the rice starts to boil, let it cook in the boiling water for just 3 minutes. For Kacchi Gosht Dum Biryani, the rice should not be cooked more than 70-80%.

audio_description: As soon as I removed the lid and foil, a wonderful aroma spread throughout the house. Gently mix the rice from bottom to top so that the spices and chicken mix well with the rice. This is the Hyderabadi...
